  • Uses of LevelException in edu.uoc.uocnejitos.controller

    Methods in edu.uoc.uocnejitos.controller that throw LevelException 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void Game.loadLevel()
    Loads a new level by using the value of numLevel attribute.
    boolean Game.nextLevel()
    Checks if there is a new level, sets numMoves = 0 and loads the level.
    void Game.reload()
    Reload the current level, i.e. assigns 0 to numMoves and load the level again.

    private int Level.calculateColumn​(char columnChar)
    Given a letter that represents an integer, it returns integer index corresponding to the board.

    Given a letter, it returns integer index corresponding to the board.
    Piece Level.getPiece​(int row, int column)
    Retrieve the piece which is in the cell (row,column).
    Piece Level.getPiece​(Coordinate coord)
    Retrieve the piece which is in the cell "coord".
    void Level.setPiece​(Coordinate coord, Piece piece)
    Sets the "piece" in the specific cell indicated by "coord".
